content: How in the hell did you class warfare out of what happened here? The man got drug off the plane against his will and got injured in the process and will no doubt get at least a couple million bucks from it. Your imagination is astounding, you should consider writing fiction. Let me give you a little lesson in sales. The average person knows 250 people, now they may not have a personal relationship with all of them but, they still know that many. If you told all 250 people that you know not to fly United and they told the 250 people they know. Don’t you think United would get the message pretty quick. You can do the math.
